channel.title: Journal on Nick Ng
channel.description: Recent content in Journal on Nick Ng

item.title: I'm Going Full Remote
item.description: Going full-time remote working has always been on my mind, but this year, I am planning to make it become a reality It is one of my goals that I will be working on, and by end of this year, I aim to be working on projects remotely. Why remote working? The possibilities are endless. Yes, I really mean endless. I get to work anywhere I want to. I can live in a city with a lower cost of living which will help me on my journey of financial independence
